name: Looks like among us but not sus
name_original: Looks like among us but not sus
description:
LOOKS LIKE AMONG US BUT NOT SUS

Hey yall, check out this FREE quick short game with cool character animations and easy traps to get over...…but if you die you have to start from the beginning.

The main objective is to collect all the bananas as fast as you can without dying. fun my record is 23 seconds try to beat that if you can ;-)

Have fun and be smooth with it:-)

Game features

  • Easy simple game logic- move and jump
  • Cute character animations
  • Lo-fi chill background music as you play
  • Easy controls (W, A, S, D & space bar) platform game from left to right POV so W and S will not be of use
  • Press ALT and F4 to exit (windows)
  • Press command + W to exit (mac)
  • have fun and be smooth with it
